mapper.insert: insert into AM_TRAIN_RECORD (ID, PERSONAL_ID, TRAIN_START_DATETIME, TRAIN_END_DATETIME, TRAIN_ADDRESS, TRAIN_CONTENT, TRAIN_SPEAKER, TRAIN_LEVEL, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON, DELETE_FLAG, DELETE_DATETIME, DELETE_PERSON, TRAINING_SUBJECT, TRAINING_PARTY) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{personalId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainStartDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{trainEndDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{trainAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainContent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainSpeaker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteDatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deletePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainingSubject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{trainingParty,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.select: select ID, PERSONAL_ID, TRAIN_START_DATETIME, TRAIN_END_DATETIME, TRAIN_ADDRESS, TRAIN_CONTENT, TRAIN_SPEAKER, TRAIN_LEVEL, CREATE_DATETIME, CREATE_PERSON, UPDATE_DATETIME, UPDATE_PERSON, DELETE_FLAG, DELETE_DATETIME, DELETE_PERSON, TRAINING_SUBJECT, TRAINING_PARTY from AM_TRAIN_RECORD where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
